mdRecord.dcterms:title: School Volunteer Reading Help Program
mdRecord.dcterms:description: School Volunteer Reading Help Program description / "The School Volunteer Reading Help Program is primarily a reading-assistance program. By assisting individual children or small groups the volunteers seek: (1) To assist those children who are selected for the Reading Help Program reach their reading potential and improve related language skills. (2) To supplement the teaching of reading done by classroom teachers. (3) To influence children's attitude toward books and learning."
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Unknown
